name: The BIGS
description:
The BIGS elevates America’s favorite pastime to new heights with larger-than-life ballparks, heroic gameplay and incredible player models. Setting this MLB® experience apart from anything you’ve ever seen before are spectacular power-ups, stunning special effects, and a totally unique career mode. Featuring fantastic pitching, batting and fielding animations, The BIGS brings new meaning to the term highlight reel.

  • Wii Batting – Swing for the fences with the Wii Remote. Swinging angle, timing, and swing speed play a key roll in determining your success at the plate.
  • Wii Baserunning – Leg it out for extra bases by utilizing a drumming motion with the Wii Remote and Nunchuk.
  • Wii Pitching – Tap into an arsenal of pitches with the Wii Remote. Pitch type and speed are determined by arm speed, wrist movement and button selection.
  • Wii Fielding – Jumping catches, wall climbs, double plays and more are controlled by the directional motions of the Wii Remote and Nunchuk.
  • 2K Beats – Featuring Jane’s Addiction, Motorhead, Fu Manchu, Primus, Killing Joke, Rollins Band, White Zombie, Satellite Party, Screaming Trees and The Stooges.
